name: Articuno

ability.name: Quickfreeze
ability.effect: When you put Articuno into play (except during setup) flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Ice Breath
attacks.effect: Deal 40 damage to one of your opponent's Pokemon at random (use a d6).

flavor: A legendary bird Pokemon. It freezes water that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.
